title: Civil service guidelines?
content: Governance & Public Affairs | Ministry of Public Administration | Civil Servant Information | Civil service guidelines? | Check Public Admin portal for latest guidelines and circulars.

metadata.instructions: Refer to the circular section for updates.

title: How to apply for a transfer?
content: Governance & Public Affairs | Ministry of Public Administration | Civil Servant Information | How to apply for a transfer? | Submit a transfer application form with supporting documents.

metadata.instructions: Attach service record and approval from current department.

doc_id: governance_public_affairs::ministry_justice::court_services::How do I check my court case status?
title: How do I check my court case status?
content: Governance & Public Affairs | Ministry of Justice | Court Services | How do I check my court case status? | You can check your case status online at www.justiceministry.gov.lk/cases or by visiting the relevant court registry.

metadata.instructions: Have your case reference number ready when checking status.

title: How to request legal aid?
content: Governance & Public Affairs | Ministry of Justice | Court Services | How to request legal aid? | Submit a legal aid application at the Legal Aid Commission office or online.

metadata.instructions: Attach proof of income and ID copy.

title: Consular assistance?
content: Governance & Public Affairs | Ministry of Foreign Affairs | Consular Services | Consular assistance? | Contact your nearest Sri Lankan embassy for help with passports, emergencies, and legal matters.

metadata.instructions: Visit the embassy website for appointment booking.

title: How to renew a passport abroad?
content: Governance & Public Affairs | Ministry of Foreign Affairs | Consular Services | How to renew a passport abroad? | Submit renewal form and old passport at the embassy.

metadata.instructions: Attach passport photos and pay renewal fee.

title: How to apply for visa?
content: Governance & Public Affairs | Ministry of Immigration | Visa Services | How to apply for visa? | Visit Immigration Dept.

title: How to join military?
content: Governance & Public Affairs | Ministry of Defence | Military Recruitment | How to join military? | Check defence ministry website.

title: How to file taxes?
content: Economic Development & Infrastructure | Ministry of Finance | Tax Information | How to file taxes? | File taxes online at www.ird.gov.lk or visit the IRD office.

metadata.instructions: Have your TIN and income documents ready.

title: How to get a TIN?
content: Economic Development & Infrastructure | Ministry of Finance | Tax Information | How to get a TIN? | Apply at IRD with your National ID and proof of income.

metadata.instructions: Fill out the TIN application form and submit at IRD.

title: How to claim a tax refund?
content: Economic Development & Infrastructure | Ministry of Finance | Tax Information | How to claim a tax refund? | Submit refund request form with supporting documents at IRD.

metadata.instructions: Attach proof of tax payment and bank details.

title: Register a new business?
content: Economic Development & Infrastructure | Ministry of Industry & Trade | Business Registration | Register a new business? | Contact Registrar of Companies.

title: Pay electricity bill?
content: Economic Development & Infrastructure | Ministry of Power & Energy | Electricity Bills | Pay electricity bill? | Online or post office.

title: How to get a driving license?
content: Economic Development & Infrastructure | Ministry of Transport | Driving License Services | How to get a driving license? | Visit DMT.

doc_id: economic_development_infra::ministry_it::None::How to apply for an IT certificate?
title: How to apply for an IT certificate?
content: Economic Development & Infrastructure | Ministry of IT & Digital Affairs | IT Certificates | How to apply for an IT certificate? | Fill online form and upload NIC.

metadata.instructions: Visit the digital portal, register and submit application.

title: Nearest hospital?
content: Social & Human Development | Ministry of Health | Public Hospitals | Nearest hospital? | Check health ministry portal.

title: How to register a school?
content: Social & Human Development | Ministry of Education | Schools | How to register a school? | Complete registration form and submit documents.

metadata.instructions: Follow the guidelines on the education portal.

title: How to apply for national exam?
content: Social & Human Development | Ministry of Education | Exams & Results | How to apply for national exam? | Register via examination portal.

title: Find job openings?
content: Social & Human Development | Ministry of Labour | Employment Services | Find job openings? | Visit employment exchange.

title: Youth development programs?
content: Social & Human Development | Ministry of Youth Affairs | Youth Programs | Youth development programs? | Check youth services council.

title: Apply for housing?
content: Social & Human Development | Ministry of Housing | Housing Schemes | Apply for housing? | Contact NHDA.

title: Subsidies for farmers?
content: Social & Human Development | Ministry of Agriculture | Farmer Support Services | Subsidies for farmers? | Contact Agrarian Services.

title: Apply for new water connection?
content: Social & Human Development | Ministry of Water Supply | Water Connections | Apply for new water connection? | Contact NWSDB.

title: Waste disposal guidelines?
content: Environment, Culture & Tourism | Ministry of Environment | Waste Management | Waste disposal guidelines? | Check CEA guidelines.

title: Upcoming cultural events?
content: Environment, Culture & Tourism | Ministry of Culture | Cultural Events | Upcoming cultural events? | Visit cultural affairs department.

title: Popular tourist spots?
content: Environment, Culture & Tourism | Ministry of Tourism | Tourist Information | Popular tourist spots? | Check SL Tourism website.

title: What services are offered?
content: Other Government Services | General Government Services | General Inquiries | What services are offered? | Please check the service list on the portal.
